Dialogue: Who the hell are you? What the hell do you want? I don’t care, go find yourself a table that isn’t occupied.
Pardon me, Ma’am. Just looking for a place to sit and have an ale, that's all.
I was just following that awful corpse smell. And then suddenly, here I am.
Well you can't sit here. Get lost.
I'm going to beat you over the head with your own spine until you're choking on blood!

Dialogue: Alright then ma'am. Thank you for your time.
You know what, I think I'm just going to sit down.
